lang.w.pufflecare.manual.toc.title: Contents
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.whatis.title: What Is A Puffle?
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.whatis.description1: Puffles are small, round, furry creatures. They make great pets! Most species are native to the wilds of Club Penguin, although some have been discovered elsewhere.
lang.w.pufflecare.care.purchase.prompt: Would you like to purchase a new puffle?
lang.w.puffleadoption.quiz.entry.title: Quiz
lang.w.puffleadoption.quiz.entry.subtext: Which puffle is the most like you?
lang.w.puffleadoption.selected.stats.title: Stats
lang.w.puffleadoption.selected.stats.name: Name
lang.w.puffleadoption.dialog.namepuffle.title: Please give your new puffle a name
lang.w.puffleadoption.dialog.namepuffle.subte: Be sure you like this name. It can't be changed later.
lang.w.puffleadoption.dialog.costincludes.agr: I, %0% agree to adopt %1% for 800 coins.
lang.w.puffleadoption.quiz.exit.subtext: you'd make a great %0% puffle owner.
lang.w.puffleadoption.dialog.costincludes.agr: I, %0% agree to adopt %1% for 800 coins.
lang.w.puffleadoption.dialog.costincludes.pro: Ready to adopt your new healthy, happy puffle?
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.card.description1: Your puffle will let you know when it is happy, sad, tired or hungry.
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.card.description2: Click the Food tab to feed it, the Play tab to get its toys, or the Care tab to groom, walk, or ask your puffle to sleep.
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.card.description3: If you want to look at the Handbook or read/print your pet's Adoption Certificate, click "Pet Papers".
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.card.description4: If you care for your puffle, it'll be in your igloo. If it isn't happy and healthy, it will return to its natural habitat.
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.card.title: Caring for your Puffle
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.playing.title: Playing Games
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.playing.subtitle: Taking some puffles into games can help you earn more coins!
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.health.walking.title: Walking
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.health.walking.descr: Puffles love to walk with you (one at a time). It'll even dance when you do! When you're done walking, click your player card and then the puffle.
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.health.playing.title: Playing
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.health.playing.descr:
Your puffles love playing. Try getting puffle furniture items for your igloo.

And that's not all... there's lots to discover about your puffle. Enjoy your pet!
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.handbook.description: They're known for their awesome team work. Few realize that each week blue puffles eat their weight in cookies.
From the wilds of Rockhopper Island, they love adventure. Puffle experts wonder what secrets they hold.
It is said that the pink puffle's fur can hold 30 times its weight in water.
The flash of a disco ball transforms this stylish puffle into a powerful dance force.
Although mostly quiet, sudden fiery outbursts show there is more to these intense creatures than meets the eye.
Are experts on unicycles. They are also known for their love of April Fool's parties.
It may be smaller than all other puffles, but its power is unmeasurable
It is rumored that the yellow puffle creates artwork from food and furniture.
This species has teeth strong enough to demolish petrified Puffle O's. And everything else.
It is documented that the brown puffle blinks more than all other puffles. Its dreams have graph paper backgrounds.
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.description.value.ob: Bursting into flames after eating Puffle O's
Vacuums up cookies with its mouth
Makes music that gets everyone dancing
Choosing just the right outfit for just the right occasion
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.description.value.co: Laughs an average of 14.7 times a day
It puts a beret on before it paints
Sleeps very deeply and drools... and drools...
lang.w.pufflecare.care.return.prompt: Are you sure you want to return %0% to its natural habitat?
lang.w.puffleadoption.dialog.completeaction.p: Do you want to take %0% for a walk or back to your igloo?
lang.w.puffleadoption.oops.message: To adopt and care for more than 2 puffles, you must become a member. We'd love to have you join!
lang.w.puffleadoption.oops.title: OOPS!
lang.w.pufflecare.manual.whatis.description2: Each puffle is unique. Everyone can adopt 2 (red and blue). Members can adopt every color and up to 20.
